snippet: Open Source Gallery hosted its seventh annual Soap Box Derby on Saturday in Park Slope, Brooklyn. Children made their vehicles from salvaged materials over the course of a weeklong camp.
abstract: Open Source Gallery holds its seventh annual Soap Box Derby on 17th Street in Park Slope, Brooklyn; children constructed vehicles from salvaged materials over the course of a weeklong camp, with their entries judged on speed, design, engineering and originality.
lead_paragraph: Open Source Gallery hosted its seventh annual Soap Box Derby on Saturday in Park Slope, Brooklyn. Children made their vehicles from salvaged materials over the course of a weeklong camp.

headline.main: An End-of-Summer Race That’s Not Just About Speed
headline.print_headline: An End-of-Summer Race That’s Not Just About Speed
